data.transfer.updater

Class ApplicationUpdateChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.transfer.updater.ApplicationUpdateChecker

  • public class ApplicationUpdateChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Has the responsibility to check the applications version files on the FTP repository, and check if it is more recent than the local ones.
    Author:
    Thomas Debouverie
